title: Eyes on Ojochal
description: Costa Rica Living: An American family moves to paradise. Beaches, jungles, waterfalls. Follow our adventures.

seo.defaultDescription: Discover the beauty of Costa Rica's southern Pacific coast. Experience Uvita and Ojochal through our eyes - pristine beaches, lush jungles, and vibrant culture.
seo.defaultKeywords: Costa Rica, Uvita, Ojochal, Pacific coast, beaches, wildlife, tropical paradise, Costa Rica living, expat life, Costa Rica real estate, Costa Rica tourism
